class.name: Spatial
class.brief_description: Most basic 3D game object, parent of all 3D related nodes.
class.description: Most basic 3D game object, with a 3D [Transform] and visibility settings. All other 3D game objects inherit from Spatial. Use Spatial as a parent node to move, scale, rotate and show/hide children in a 3D project.

method.name: get_gizmo
method.description: Returns the SpatialGizmo for this node. Used for example in [EditorSpatialGizmo] as custom visualization and editing handles in Editor.

method.name: get_parent_spatial
method.description: Returns the parent [code]Spatial[/code], or an empty [Object] if no parent exists or parent is not of type [code]Spatial[/code].

method.name: get_world
method.description: Returns the current [World] resource this Spatial node is registered to.

method.name: global_rotate
method.description: Rotates the current node along normal [Vector3] by angle in radians in Global space.

method.name: global_translate
method.description: Moves the node by [Vector3] offset in Global space.

method.name: hide
method.description: Disables rendering of this node. Change Spatial Visible property to false.

method.name: is_local_transform_notification_enabled
method.description: Returns whether node notifies about its local transformation changes. Spatial will not propagate this by default.

method.name: is_set_as_toplevel
method.description: Returns whether this node is set as Toplevel, that is whether it ignores its parent nodes transformations.

method.name: is_transform_notification_enabled
method.description: Returns whether the node notifies about its global and local transformation changes. Spatial will not propagate this by default.

method.name: is_visible_in_tree
method.description: Returns whether the node is visible, taking into consideration that its parents visibility.

method.name: look_at
method.description: Rotates itself to point into direction of target position. Operations take place in global space.

method.name: look_at_from_position
method.description: Moves the node to specified position and then rotates itself to point into direction of target position. Operations take place in global space.

method.name: orthonormalize
method.description: Resets this node's transformations (like scale, skew and taper) preserving its rotation and translation. Performs orthonormalization on this node [Transform3D].

method.name: rotate
method.description: Rotates the node in local space on given normal [Vector3] by angle in radians.

method.name: rotate_x
method.description: Rotates the node in local space on X axis by angle in radians.

method.name: rotate_y
method.description: Rotates the node in local space on Y axis by angle in radians.

method.name: rotate_z
method.description: Rotates the node in local space on Z axis by angle in radians.

method.name: set_as_toplevel
method.description: Makes the node ignore its parents transformations. Node transformations are only in global space.

method.name: set_gizmo
method.description: Set [SpatialGizmo] for this node. Used for example in [EditorSpatialGizmo] as custom visualization and editing handles in Editor.

method.name: set_identity
method.description: Reset all transformations for this node. Set its [Transform3D] to identity matrix.

method.name: set_ignore_transform_notification
method.description: Set whether the node ignores notification that its transformation (global or local) changed.

method.name: set_notify_local_transform
method.description: Set whether the node notifies about its local transformation changes. Spatial will not propagate this by default.

method.name: set_notify_transform
method.description: Set whether the node notifies about its global and local transformation changes. Spatial will not propagate this by default.

method.name: show
method.description: Enables rendering of this node. Change Spatial Visible property to "True".

method.name: to_global
method.description: Transforms [Vector3] "local_point" from this node's local space to world space.

method.name: to_local
method.description: Transforms [Vector3] "global_point" from world space to this node's local space.

method.name: translate
method.description: Changes the node's position by given offset [Vector3].

method.name: update_gizmo
method.description: Updates the [SpatialGizmo] of this node.

members.member: Local euler rotation in radians of this node.
Local euler rotation in degrees of this node.
Visibility of this node. Toggles if this node is rendered.

constants.constant: Spatial nodes receives this notification when their global transform changes. This means that either the current or a parent node changed its transform. In order for NOTIFICATION_TRANSFORM_CHANGED to work user first needs to ask for it, with set_notify_transform(true).
Spatial nodes receives this notification when they are registered to new [World] resource.
Spatial nodes receives this notification when they are unregistered from current [World] resource.
Spatial nodes receives this notification when their visibility changes.
